body.name: ROYAL CRAFT WOOD Premium Bamboo Kitchen Utensil Rack: Elegant Organizer and Spacious Utensil Holder for Streamlined Kitchen Storage

byLineInfo.name: Visit the ROYAL CRAFT WOOD Store

features: PLEASE MEASURE YOUR DRAWER PRIOR TO PURCHASE: In order to ensure the perfect fit of your bamboo utensil organizer, we kindly request you take a moment to measure the dimensions of the intended drawer(s) for use. The Royal Craft Wood Basic Kitchen Utensil Tray measures 16.3” x 12.3” x 1.9”, and is made to fit most standard drawers. Your drawer needs to measure larger than these minimum requirements for the kitchen drawer organizers to properly fit.

ALL NATURAL 100% SUSTAINABLE BAMBOO CONSTRUCTION: Made from all natural, eco-friendly, renewable bamboo, this utensil organizer is crafted using the most environmentally friendly practices. Royal Craft Wood cares about the planet & aims to inspire consumers to help reduce our carbon footprint. The silverware organizer is biodegradable and can even be repurposed after use. The drawer organizer kitchen utensils are not only functional in your kitchen, but practical to help the environment.

DESIGNED WITH YOU IN MIND: Super easy to install, just set and forget your bamboo drawer organizer. It’s as simple as that! Royal Craft Wood aimed to make your cutlery organizer in drawer everything you would need, an all in one storage and organizational solution. With 7 compartments, there is room in your silverware organizer for drawer for your complete set of regular dinner flatware as well as a few larger utensils such as serving spoons or salad hands

DURABLE DESIGN FOR RELIABLE LONGEVITY: Crafted from a solid piece of natural bamboo wood, the utensil drawer organizer features deep compartments to allow for maximum use of drawer space. The reinforced wooden base ensures the silverware holder for drawer will safely hold your items without warping or breaking under pressure or weight. Our spoon organizer for kitchen drawers are built to last for years to come, the only organizer you will ever need for your kitchen organizational needs.

MULTIPURPOSE USE: This versatile silverware tray for drawer is not only perfect for use in the kitchen, but is designed to be useful throughout the home or office. Use the cutlery organizer to sort office supplies in your desk to keep your pencils, pens, paper clips, post-its, and more easily visible and easy to reach. This utensils organizer may also be used to sort arts and craft supplies, tools in your toolbox, toiletries, makeup and makeup tools, or even underwear in your bedroom dresser.

EASY TO USE AND CARE FOR: This drawer organizer kitchen storage unit is easy for anyone to use. After measuring your drawer to ensure the bamboo silverware drawer organizer is a good fit, place it into an empty drawer and fill the compartments with your spoons, knives, forks, spatula, ladle, & more! Our flatware organizer requires little to no maintenance. If there is dust, food scraps, or dirt, simply remove all the items and wipe clean with a damp cloth. It’s as simple as that!

THE KITCHEN DRAWER ORGANIZATIONAL SOLUTION YOU’VE BEEN SEARCHING FOR: Bring order and neatness to your chaotic kitchen with the Royal Craft Wood Utensil Organizer. Say goodbye to wasted time spent rummaging through drawers to find your what you need. With the silverware organizer, you will be able to easily retrieve any tool you need, when you need it, no guesswork involved. The drawer organizer kitchen utensil holder will transform your kitchen into a functional & practical space you can enjoy.

EFFICIENT STORAGE SOLUTION FOR ANY DRAWER: With a thoroughly thought through design, the Royal Craft Wood Drawer Utensil Organizer features 7 compartments to hold just about any kitchen utensil or small gadget you have on hand. The bamboo organizer drawer provides practical storage and a functional design, allowing you to rest easy knowing you’ll never have to treasure-hunt while preparing your meals ever again. Flatware and utensil storage has never been quicker or easier!

STYLISH AND UNIQUE DESIGN: This kitchen silverware organizer is made of natural bamboo wood, giving it an elegant, sophisticated, and classic appeal. While minimal in design, the silverware trays for kitchen drawers send a major statement, leaving a major impact. This clean, crisp kitchen utensils organizer will easily fit in with existing decor and can be used as a centerpiece during your next dining event. The stylish, unique design sets this organizer apart from all others.

PRACTICAL AND THOUGHTFUL GIFT IDEA: The Royal Craft Wood Bamboo Utensil Holder makes for the perfect gift for all occasions. Whether attending a housewarming or giving a bridal shower or wedding gift, the kitchen drawer organizer for utensils is a useful and functional item that anyone can easily make use of. This is a great spoon organizer for birthdays, anniversaries, holidays, and so much more!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Designed for a tight, connected fit, 4 anti-slip grip feet are located on the bottom for a secure hold. Heavy duty cross bars keep all goods separated and in their designated space.

Organize your messy cutlery and storage spaces, including the miscellaneous odds and ends area. When adding or retrieving items, put them back properly—don't just toss them. This keeps things neat and saves future organization time.

Inspire productivity in your home by giving each item a designated place. Making use of your organizer will help you cut down on time searching for items, maximizing your efficiency and allowing you to focus on more important tasks, like creating your next culinary masterpiece.

Crafted to be the perfect storage organizer, this silverware tray is not only for kitchen use, but can be an effective bamboo organizer to keep office supplies sorted, tools organized, makeup tools & palettes separated, and so much more. This is the perfect divider for all sorting needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Take steps by glueing and waxing to give it a long life.
reviews.reviewText: I just received this yesterday and so far, I like it. It really made my flatware drawer more accessible and organized.After reading helpful reviews, I just about knew exactly what I was getting and am very pleased with my purchase. I am going to leave some helpful tips to help prevent some of the issues complained about in other reviews.Mine is very sturdy and very nice, functions very well and definitely upgraded my flatware drawer.After reading reviews of it falling apart and slipping around in the drawer, I took steps as soon as I opened it to prevent those issues. And I would like to share them so that others may prevent future issues. They are very simple steps and basic care for thin wood such as bamboo.Before using it,I reinforced it with some indoor/outdoor wood glue on every single joint.Once the glue dried, I applied wood wax.....top bottom, every side ....everywhere. The wax will help repel water from seeping into the wood as well as prevent moisture in the air from warping the bamboo. If your drawer is near your sink,dishwasher or stove....no matter what wooden insert you buy, it is going to be necessary to wax it and maybe even glue it.. Apply both glue and wax heavily. Allow the glue to dry before applying the wax. Then allow the wax to dry before adding your flatware.Once it is dry, use something in the back of the drawer to keep it from slipping. I used some little blocks of wood to fill the gap in the back between the tray and the back of the drawer. This gave me 3 extra compartments as well as kept my tray securely in place.I also used a little thin peace of wood to keep the slide outs from slipping shut everytime the drawer is opened. The wood blocks are very simple as well removable solutions.You will need to reapply the wax every six months to a year. Which is simple to do.....just wipe some wax on whenever you take it out to clean it. Make sure the wood is dry before applying the wax.The entire piece plus slide outs is two inches deep, so the center section is not 2 inches deep, but more like 1½ inches deep. That's because the slide outs slide under the center section when closed. So yes there is a depth difference in order for everything to be flush in height across the top. But it holds a lot of flatware plus extras. I have about 20 of everything plus the serving pieces and it all fits wonderfully. Even though I can only use one side of the slide outs, because my drawer is only 15 inches wide. This was the perfect solution to have a tray that fits my drawer perfectly....like a custom made tray! I love it!It is neat, clean spacious, practical and just looks so very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the ROYAL CRAFT WOOD Luxury Bamboo Kitchen Drawer Organizer and I have been extremely impressed with its quality and functionality. As someone who loves to cook and spends a lot of time in the kitchen, I was in need of an organizer that could help me keep my utensils and kitchen tools neatly arranged and easily accessible. This organizer has exceeded my expectations.The bamboo material is beautiful and sturdy. It adds a touch of elegance to my kitchen and is also very easy to clean. The adjustable dividers are a great feature that allows me to customize the organizer to fit my specific needs. I'm able to organize my utensils and tools by size and type, which makes it much easier to find what I need when I'm cooking.The organizer is also very spacious and fits perfectly in my kitchen drawer. It has helped me maximize my storage space and keeps my kitchen tools organized and clutter-free. The quality of the product is top-notch and I can tell that it will last for years to come.Overall, I highly recommend the ROYAL CRAFT WOOD Luxury Bamboo Kitchen Drawer Organizer to anyone looking for an efficient and stylish way to organize their kitchen tools. It's a great investment that will help you save time and make cooking much more enjoyable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This utensil organizer looks like it was custom made for my drawer. It seems very well made and the materials are very attractive. The areas are the perfect size for my utensils and give me plenty of space for everything I need in the drawer. I couldn’t be happier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, functional and beautiful material
reviews.reviewText: I like the flexibility in the size - it fit my drawer perfectly and allowed me the extra pull out room on the side that I used for melon baller, chop sticks and napkin rings. This accommodate 8-piece service ware along with 3-pieces; I.e. meat fork etc. good price and shows my everyday dinner ware with a special touch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The product expands with ease and holds my 16 piece utensil sets. This product fits in my shallow drawer which was why I had to return my first one. It is not a luxury bamboo but it is sturdy enough for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this silverware holder. Adjustable and sturdy, though looks elegant. Has extra space for other items. I have already raved about it to several other people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits the bill
reviews.reviewText: It is sturdy, good looking, and affords more storage than the average utensil organizer. The only unfortunate thing is that my drawer is a teensy bit too all to use one compartment, but that's more my fault. Despite this, it still provided more organization than others.Now my husband won't go crazy looking at all of the junk in the drawer rolling around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Looks great! I don’t have a drawer big enough to extend the sides, but it looks great and keeps everything so much better organized. Great quality.

reviews.reviewTitle: You will be happy with this product! :)
reviews.reviewText: (DISREGARD REVIEW & see last lines!) I have "a lot" of kitchen gadgets so wanted something larger than the standard plastic I've always had. Love that this product expands, is made of quality wood & it's really rich looking! The packaging is even rich looking if you wanted to give as a gift. You can tell the min you open it that this company stands behind their products. You won't be disappointed! SEE BELOW!***** After putting it in my drawer I noticed the part that expands was broken off. I took it out of my drawer and while putting it in the box to send for a refund the whole thing fell apart. Any part that could come apart did all over my kitchen floor!! I went from extremely happy with a positive review to saying "THIS IS A PIECE OF CRAP! Very unhappy! The box held together but the product didn't! *****
The fact that it extends to fit in the drawer is the best part of this product. It's sturdy and big enough for most of my utensils. Happy with this purchase.
Nice accept for knives slid under gap to adjoining section. Husband fixed it.
Beautiful. Excellent quality. Fits my drawer like a glove.

decently well-constructed but the measurements of the compartments are wrong. i’ve included photos to illustrate. the listing describes them being 2.5” inches but as you can see they are irregular and at most 2-¼”. the larger compartments are only 2-¾” instead of 3”.i’ve decided to make it work, but this is disappointing. it seems that the least a company can do is supply an accurate description.
